InteractionConfig
[System.Serializable]
public
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​Configuration.​InteractionConfig

This class is a container for all of the settings related to the interactions being processed by the TouchFree Service. The settings at the root of this object will affect all sensations. There are also some settings specific to the Hover and Hold interaction which can be modified by changing the contained HoverAndHoldInteractionSettings.

In order to modify the settings of the service, create an instance of this class, make the changes you wish to see, and then send it to the server using the ConfigurationManager.

Like all of the Settings classes found in this file, all members are optional. If you do not modify a member of this class, its value will not change when the instance is sent to TouchFree Service.

Properties
useScrollingOrDragging
public bool useScrollingOrDragging { get; set }

If true, allows interactions to send up/down events seperately, enabling dragging or touchscreen-like scrolling behaviours. If false, up/down events will be sent together, and every down will function like a click of its own.

deadzoneRadius
public float deadzoneRadius { get; set }

All interactions use a small deadzone to stabilise the position of the cursor, to prevent small user movements from making the cursor shake in place. This setting controls the radius of that deadzone.

interactionZoneEnabled
public bool interactionZoneEnabled { get; set }

Changes whether the Interaction Zone values will be used

interactionMinDistanceCm
public float interactionMinDistanceCm { get; set }

The minimum distance from the screen that users can interact within

interactionMaxDistanceCm
public float interactionMaxDistanceCm { get; set }

The maximum distance from the screen that users can interact within

interactionType
public InteractionType interactionType { get; set }

This represents the type of interaction currently selected

Variables
HoverAndHold
public HoverAndHoldInteractionSettings HoverAndHold
TouchPlane
public TouchPlaneInteractionSettings TouchPlane
configValues
public Dictionary<string, object> configValues

This dictionary is used to store the edited members only, and is accessed when serializing the data for transfer to the Service.

DO NOT MODIFY THIS DICTIONARY MANUALLY

UseScrollingOrDragging
[SerializeField]
private bool UseScrollingOrDragging
DeadzoneRadius
[SerializeField]
private float DeadzoneRadius
InteractionZoneEnabled
[SerializeField]
private bool InteractionZoneEnabled
InteractionMinDistanceCm
[SerializeField]
private float InteractionMinDistanceCm
InteractionMaxDistanceCm
[SerializeField]
private float InteractionMaxDistanceCm
InteractionType
[SerializeField]
private InteractionType InteractionType
HoverAndHoldInteractionSettings
[System.Serializable]
public
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​Configuration.​HoverAndHoldInteractionSettings

This class is a container for settings that only apply to the Hover and Hold interaction. In order to modify these settings of the TouchFree Service, create an InteractionConfig, which contains an instance of this class, modify it as required, and then pass to the service using the ConfigurationManager.

Like all of the Settings classes found in this file, all members are optional. If you do not modify a member of this class, its value will not change when the instance is sent to TouchFree Service.

Properties
hoverStartTimeS
public float hoverStartTimeS { get; set }

This determines how long (in seconds) the user must hold their hand in place before the interaction will begin. If the hand remains in place until the interaction completes, a click event will be sent.

hoverCompleteTimeS
public float hoverCompleteTimeS { get; set }

This determines how long (in seconds) the user must hold their hand in place after the interaction has begun before the interaction will complete, and a click event will be sent.

Variables
configValues
public Dictionary<string, object> configValues

This dictionary is used to store the edited members only, and is accessed when serializing the data for transfer to the Service.

DO NOT MODIFY THIS DICTIONARY MANUALLY

HoverStartTimeS
[SerializeField]
private float HoverStartTimeS
HoverCompleteTimeS
[SerializeField]
private float HoverCompleteTimeS
TouchPlaneInteractionSettings
[System.Serializable]
public
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​Configuration.​TouchPlaneInteractionSettings

This class is a container for settings that only apply to the TouchPlane interaction. In order to modify these settings of the TouchFree Service, create an InteractionConfig, which contains an instance of this class, modify it as required, and then pass to the service using the ConfigurationManager.

Like all of the Settings classes found in this file, all members are optional. If you do not modify a member of this class, its value will not change when the instance is sent to TouchFree Service.

Properties
touchPlaneActivationDistanceCM
public float touchPlaneActivationDistanceCM { get; set }

This determines how far (in cm) the TouchPlane is from the screen surface. This represents the plane that the user must pass to begin and end a click event.

touchPlaneTrackedPosition
public TrackedPosition touchPlaneTrackedPosition { get; set }

This determines which bone position will be tracked when performing the interaction.

Variables
configValues
public Dictionary<string, object> configValues

This dictionary is used to store the edited members only, and is accessed when serializing the data for transfer to the Service.

DO NOT MODIFY THIS DICTIONARY MANUALLY

TouchPlaneActivationDistanceCM
[SerializeField]
private float TouchPlaneActivationDistanceCM
TouchPlaneTrackedPosition
[SerializeField]
private TrackedPosition TouchPlaneTrackedPosition
PhysicalConfig
[System.Serializable]
public
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​Configuration.​PhysicalConfig

This class is a container for all of the settings related to the physical setup of the hardware, both the tracking camera and the display.

In order to modify the settings of the service, create an instance of this class, make the changes you wish to see, and then send it to the server using the ConfigurationManager.

Like all of the Settings classes found in this file, all members are optional. If you do not modify a member of this class, its value will not change when the instance is sent to TouchFree Service.

Properties
screenHeightM
public float screenHeightM { get; set }

The height of the screen in meters. This is needed in order to determine the relationship between hand location in the real world and pixel locations on screen.

leapPositionRelativeToScreenBottomM
public Vector3 leapPositionRelativeToScreenBottomM { get; set }

The position (measured in meters) in 3d space of the Leap Motion camera relative to the center of the bottom edge of the screen.

This uses a left handed coordinate system where: X = left/right (right = positive) Y = up/down (up = positive) Z = forward/backward (forward = positive)

leapRotationD
public Vector3 leapRotationD { get; set }

The rotation of the Leap Motion Camera relative to the unity world space, measured in degrees

screenRotationD
public float screenRotationD { get; set }

The rotation of the physical screen relative to the unity world space, measured in degrees

Variables
configValues
public Dictionary<string, object> configValues

This dictionary is used to store the edited members only, and is accessed when serializing the data for transfer to the Service.

DO NOT MODIFY THIS DICTIONARY MANUALLY

ScreenHeightM
[SerializeField]
private float ScreenHeightM
LeapPositionRelativeToScreenBottomM
[SerializeField]
private Vector3 LeapPositionRelativeToScreenBottomM
LeapRotationD
[SerializeField]
private Vector3 LeapRotationD
ScreenRotationD
[SerializeField]
private float ScreenRotationD
Types
TrackedPosition
[System.Serializable]
public enum TrackedPosition
INDEX_STABLE

Towards the screen from the proximal knuckle position of the index finger

INDEX_TIP

The index finger tip position

WRIST

The wrist position

NEAREST

The nearest bone to the screen
